body_html:
Hi @ebrevdo the plot I'm talking about is the plot created by the code snipped in the issue.

There's no reference, the instability is pretty obvious once you change n to be on the scale of 10s of thousands. Im not currently aware of any published references analysing the numerical stability of CTC

EDIT: Oops! misunderstood the question

The paper is Alex Graves' 2006 paper "Connectionist Temporal Classification: Labelling Unsegmented Sequence Data with Recurrent Neural Networks". The plot I'm talking about is figure 4 in this paper. I've added a image for your convenience:

I've also added some example plots from the snippet:
